name: Dr. Talbot's Gas + Colic Relief Liquid Medicine, Naturally Inspired, for Infants, Includes Syringe, Apple Juice Flavor, 4 Fl Oz
short_description: Dr. Talbot's Gas + colic relief provides temporary relief from symptoms associated with colic gas pain, discomfort, irritability and acid buildup. We use Safe ingredients and real fruit juices with your child's comfort and health in mind.

Formulated with a combination of homeopathic ingredients and cell Salts, Dr. Talbot's Gas + colic relief quickly relieves tummy troubles for your little one. Tasty and fast acting, you'll love how quickly your child feels better.
Active ingredients like vegetable charcoal and Chamomile attack abdominal discomfort caused by excessive gas. Cell Salts help alleviate inflammation and hyperacidity of the stomach.

Created without unnecessary or harmful fillers, Dr. Talbot's Gas + colic relief does not contain alcohol, dyes or parabens. Rest easy knowing that our products are made using only the best that Mother Nature has to offer.
Manufactured here in the U.S.A. At an FDA GMP registered facility with HPUS compliant methods. Rest assured that your child is receiving the highest quality relief available.
Easy dose syringe takes the guess work and worry out of giving your child the correct amount of medicine! Handy syringe to bottle adapter included.
product_description: Dr. Talbot's Gas + colic relief Temporarily relieves symptoms of colic gas pain, stomach & gas discomfort, irritability from gas, and stomach acid buildup. Our Safe choice medicine uses a combination of homeopathic ingredients and cell Salts to provide relief to your child. Using real fruit juice to provide a great flavor to our medicines, you can be assured your child will not put up a fuss when medicine must be given. When using any of Dr. Talbot's Liquid homeopathic medicines, you can take advantage of our easy dose system! Every one of our homeopathic liquid medicines use the exact same dose across the range. Making it even easier on you, the parent; Dr. Talbot's has printed the dosage scale on the included syringe. No more searching the bottle or the box for the dose your child requires!dr. Talbot's believes mom and dad should be able to "choose safe first"! Homeopathic medicines are effective, have less side effects, and they are the safer Choice for using on our little ones. We believe allopathic, conventional medications should only be used if a medication with more risk is required.Our homeopathic medicine range is produced in the U.S.A. At an FDA GMP registered and inspected facility certified to produce highly regulated products.
